title: 25W: Ed Werder on Latest Drama with Dak & the Cowboys + Which “Rocky” is the Best? + Eddie is Betting His Car This Weekend
itunes:title: 25W: Ed Werder on Latest Drama with Dak & the Cowboys + Which “Rocky” is the Best? + Eddie is Betting His Car This Weekend
description:
ESPN’s NFL Reporter Ed Werder joins Bobby to discuss the latest news surrounding Dak Prescott and the Cowboys, what the atmosphere was like in Seattle on Monday Night with Russell Wilsons return, and much more! The guys also discuss their favorite sports movie of all-time, leading to a debate on which “Rocky” is the best. Plus, Eddie is putting his car up as collateral for this ‘lock of the week’.  

Download the DraftKings Sportsbook App today: https://dkng.co/bobbysports

21+ (18+ WY). Physically present in AZ/CO/CT/IL/IN/IA/LA/MI/NJ/ NY/PA/TN/VA/WV/WY only. N/A in NH/OR/ON. New customers only. Valid 1 per new customer. Min. $5 deposit. Min $5 wager. $200 issued as eight (8) $25 free bets. Ends 9/19/22. See http://draftkings.com/sportsbook for details.
